conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with consistent wall heights.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear volume, consistent wall thickness, and appropriate isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the layout; all rooms present including the complex entry lobby and utility areas. Windows are correctly positioned as glass panes.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is very accurate to the 2D plan, including the specific rug in the living room and kitchen cabinetry.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; materials are consistent and the geometry is highly readable against the dark background.

detected_errors.description: Some internal door swings are represented as open gaps rather than visible door panels.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves every architectural detail from the original floor plan with high geometric accuracy.
